overview:
Michael brings Pango his vast experience in Product Management in several disciplines, including market research, customers identification, writing business and R&D road maps, running agile development processes, acceptance tests, training and customer reaction monitoring.

At Pango, he has started the company’s US operation, including building the business plan, identifying the unique market niches for quickest proof of concept, and customer acquisition. Led the Sales, PR and Marketing efforts, including media outreach, and industry exhibitions. During the first year we have introduced a solution for two additional markets, and solidified Pango’s presence in the country.
